features: DEODORANT FOR MEN — Gillette helps fight odor before it starts with this 3.8-ounce antiperspirant and deodorant that is designed for men
72-HOUR SWEAT PROTECTION — Get 72 hours of fast-acting sweat protection that's formulated with our subtle Cool Wave scent
DRI-TECH TECHNOLOGY — Gillette Clear Gel features Dri-Tech technology for invisible sweat protection

NON-IRRITANT CLEAR GEL — Made with skin care ingredients, Clear Gel antiperspirant and deodorant is dermatologist-tested and goes on clear for anti-white mark protection clinically shown to be as gentle as water
PROTECTION YOU NEED—Gillette Clear Gel offers you the protection you need, when you need it most.
body.description: Gillette deodorant for men has one singular-focused goal, and that is to deliver the best a man can get, one swipe at a time. Precision-formulated, non-irritant* Gillette Clear Gel antiperspirant and deodorant features Dri-Tech technology to provide sweat protection—for 72 confident hours. Clear Gel is fast-acting, fights odor at the source and is highlighted by a fresh, subtle scent that goes easy on your senses. Gillette Clear Gel goes on clear and gives you invisible sweat protection. Gillette provides the protection you need, so you can be the best man you can be. *clinically shown to be as gentle as water.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good on the price!
reviews.reviewText: I've been using Gillette Clear Gel for ages. It's like my underarm superhero – no white marks, no sweat, no fuss. Smells good, too. It's a must in my daily routine!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No foul odor detected ever.
reviews.reviewText: Ever man is different , but for me this deodorant stops sweat and kills all bad odor. Could not be happier with it. Price is very reasonable for what you get. No rashes either.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good product, fair price.
reviews.reviewText: It is a good price and it’s a product I have used for years.

reviews.reviewerName: very upset to date haven't received
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stay Cool and Confident
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The Gillette Clear Gel Men's Antiperspirant and Deodorant has been my go-to solution for staying cool and confident all day long! With 72-hour sweat protection and the refreshing scent of Cool Wave, this antiperspirant and deodorant offers exceptional performance and reliability.I am impressed with the clear gel formula, which goes on smoothly and dries quickly, leaving no white marks on my clothes.The 72-hour sweat protection ensures I stay fresh and dry, even during the most active and demanding days.I appreciate the powerful antiperspirant properties of this product, keeping sweat at bay and providing long-lasting protection against odor.The Cool Wave scent is invigorating and refreshing, adding a touch of confidence to my daily routine.The antiperspirant and deodorant is designed specifically for men, offering a masculine and appealing scent.The twist-bottom design of the container makes it easy to apply and control the amount of product used.In conclusion, the Gillette Clear Gel Men's Antiperspirant and Deodorant is a reliable and effective solution for men seeking long-lasting sweat protection and a refreshing scent. Its clear gel formula, 72-hour sweat protection, and Cool Wave fragrance make it an ideal choice for everyday use. Whether I'm at work, hitting the gym, or enjoying outdoor activities, this antiperspirant and deodorant keeps me cool, dry, and confidently fresh. Embrace the confidence and reliability this Gillette Clear Gel brings and stay cool and collected throughout your day with this exceptional men's antiperspirant and deodorant!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gillette the clear winner compared to the top brands
reviews.reviewText: I have used the following competitive products over the last year: Degree, Dove, Old Spice, Gillette.Placed side by side and going at it head-to-head, Gillette Clear Gel is the clear winnerGillette’s Clear Gel goes on invisible and fresh, no chalkiness, not sticky, dries fast, as claimed actually provides protection for 48 hours plus, didn't come off onto my shirts, and a very mild scent.Degree, Dove, Old Spice are of comparable price and performance but with traits markedly different than those of Gillett, they are: stronger or recognizable scents (Old Spice is the traditional Old Spice fragrance), application, no residue on shirts, sweat protection, no irritation, lasts 48 hours, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Couldn’t ask for a better deodorant!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using this deodorant for years and couldn’t imagine using any other brand/scent. It is a fresh, simple smelling deodorant that keeps me from sweating all day!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They Only Kind I Buy!
reviews.reviewText: Gillette makes a great product and it's a good value.I like the scent of this one, and so does my girlfriend. It's the only one I buy.Do you want to have dry underarms and not stink? Just get this!
